name: RandomFact
0:
”Alexa, ask Random Fact to give me a fact”
”Tell me a fact”
”Tell me a random fact”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: random fact
des:
This skill is a single interaction. The user asks for a fact and Alexa will return a random fact.

Example interaction 1:
User: “Alexa, ask Random Fact to give me a fact”
Alexa: “Here's your fact: When hippos are upset, their sweat turns red.”

Example interaction 2:
User: “Alexa, tell me a fact”
Alexa: “Here's your fact: A flock of crows is known as a murder.”
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
